data.text:
Manual

View the manual for the Pinnacle Studio 12 here, for free. This manual comes under the category photo/video software and has been rated by 7 people with an average of a 7.8. This manual is available in the following languages: English. Do you have a question about the Pinnacle Studio 12 or do you need help? Ask your question here

Pinnacle Studio 12 specifications

Below you will find the product specifications and the manual specifications of the Pinnacle Studio 12.

Pinnacle Studio 12 is a photo and video editing software designed to provide users with a reliable and efficient editing platform. With a minimum storage drive space requirement of 2048 MB, it allows users to store their media files without worrying about running out of storage. Additionally, it requires a minimum of 1024 MB RAM, ensuring smooth operation and efficient performance. The software is compatible with Intel Pentium and AMD Athlon processors, with a minimum processing speed of 1.8 GHz, enabling users to edit their photos and videos without experiencing lags or delays. Pinnacle Studio 12 supports various image formats, including BMP, GIF, JPG, PCX, PSD, TGA, and TIF, allowing users to import and edit their photos in their preferred format. Furthermore, it supports video compression formats such as AVI and WMV, ensuring easy video editing and sharing. In terms of graphics card memory, Pinnacle Studio 12 requires a minimum of 64 MB. This allows for smooth rendering of images and videos, contributing to a seamless editing experience. When it comes to audio formats, this software supports AC3, MP3, and WAV, allowing users to utilize different types of audio files in their video projects. Overall, Pinnacle Studio 12 is a comprehensive video editor that provides users with the necessary tools and features to edit their photos and videos effectively. With its compatibility with various image and video formats, along with its system requirements, it offers a reliable and efficient platform for editing and enhancing media files.
